entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow or ice pellets. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning then changing to ice pellets then changing to rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
